import React, { Component } from 'react' import projectData from "../../ProjectData"; import {Container, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap"; import Header from '../../../Header/Header'; import "./projectDetails.css" import Accordion from '../../ProjectAccordion/Accordion'; import ProjectContent from "../ProjectDetails/ProjectContent"; export class ProjectDetails extends Component { state = { testing:"", id: "" } componentDidMount() { console.log(projectData) const length = projectData.length - 1 const postId = this.props.match.params.id if(postId > length){ this.props.history.push("/projects"); } else this.setState({id: postId, testing: projectData[postId]}) } render() { return (

Details:

  • Name: {this.state.testing.name}
  • Client:John Doe
  • Data:23/05/2020
  • Category:Welding
  • Time:2 Month
Visit Website
) } } export default ProjectDetails
